name: v2 Alternate Character Set Handling Scheme
description: FHIR Value set/code system definition for HL7 v2 table 0356 ( Alternate Character Set Handling Scheme)

concept.display: The character set switching mode specified in HL7 2.5, section 2.7.2 and section 2.A.46, "XPN - extended person name".

designation.value: De modus om te wisselen van tekenset gedefinieerd in HL7 2.5, sectie 2.A.46, "XPN - uitgebreide persoonsnaam".

concept.display: This is the default, indicating that there is no character set switching occurring in this message.

designation.value: Dit is de standaardwaarde, om aan te geven dat er geen wisselingen van tekenset voorkomen in dit bericht.

concept.display: This standard is titled "Information Technology - Character Code Structure and Extension Technique". .

designation.value: Deze standaard heet "Information Technology - Character Code Structure and Extension Technique".
